Tetris—Quadrapassel

It is an installed game defaultly on old ubuntu.

But I did not get it in mint 16(ubuntu 13.10) with cinnamon desktop environment.

For example, when you need a square, it will never give you a square.

This is a very good design, and hard to play, hard to get high scores.

Chromium BSU

It has the same name with browser chromium.

Just control a space ship to shoot the enemies. But still very difficult.

Tetris 3D— Blockout2

It is a 3d tetris game. More difficult than 2d tetris.

But the difficult is not like Quadrapassel.
